title: One Piece with a Lime - Episodes 603-608

title: One Piece Episode 608 Discussion - FanVerse
author: FanVerse Community
description: Fan discussion thread about Episode 608 with viewers praising Doflamingo's sinister music and intimidating voice acting.
notes: Fans particularly noted that Doflamingo seems much more intimidating in the anime compared to the manga

notes: First-time viewer perspective on the episodes
